short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experimental Chrome extension using Chrome's built-in Gemini Nano LLM for generating summaries of selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You need to enable "Gemini Nano" before using this extension. Follow steps here: https://github.com/gigaArpit/AI-Summarizer/blob/main/docs/extension-welcome.md
